messages.message: Iâ€™ve found the files/folders/browse links to be very small. Would some buttons be a good idea?

the reasons for the changes are described in the google doc https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ElguGvA-FSb1H6VcGKPgbT43kYhVw3zUMX60nbLFxp0/edit?pli=1#heading=h.r014fkokz6n0

the design team wanted to emphasize the drag-and-drop experience, not the buttons
@Serena if one file fails, the whole job fails?

instead of that line about limits, we updated the file uploader component so you can see an individual file's status and remove the problematic ones, would that not work? ://

https://www.figma.com/design/j2OVMRvWOaGgeOuWSU83eW/Pollen-Core-Components?node-id=7627-100694&t=SJ9GoX5aNIp84iiV-4
correct, currently the backend does not support that :(
okay, we can leave the limits line then, but i'm gonna follow up on this later :stuck_out_tongue:
yes we have a ticket for providing file-level status/progress updates here https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1896
